title: Easiest  role/champion for a complete newbie player
body: I'm a complete newbie player and am looking for a role/champion I should get involved in.  I would love any playstyle just want to be effective.

replies.body: The free champions you have to pick from while you're below level 10 are some good champs to start out with since they are a little more straightforward and easy to pick up! After that, you might be able to find some helpful suggestions by posting this kind of topic over in Gameplay. That would get you a lot heckin' lot more responses and visibility rather than posting it here ^_^
